description: It would be helpful to any 3rd party systems/infrastructure to have the instance_uuid that is being associated with a floating_ip. Currently, the payload is missing this information, merely only having the project_id and the floating_ip in question.
title: Nova Network Notifications Missing Instance UUID

comments.content: It would be helpful to any 3rd party systems/infrastructure to have the instance_uuid that is being associated with a floating_ip. Currently, the payload is missing this information, merely only having the project_id and the floating_ip in question.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~stef-ummon

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/15039
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
